title: Accelerationism and Dancing with Death
description:
Accelerationism, the notion that we should aggravate the current chaos in order for things to break down and bring about a better world is an idea that has been resurfacing now for some time.  We look at the issues it can bring about on a social, but also a personal scale.  

My new outro music was written and recorded by Matthew Wilkinson.  

Support this channel: https://thesymbolicworld.com/support/

patreon: http://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
https://www.subscribestar.com/jonathan-pageau
paypal: http://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.thesymbolicworld.com
facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TheSymbolicWorld
twitter: http://www.twitter.com/pageaujonathan

My website designers,  Anomalist Design: https://www.anomalistdesign.com/

The music at the opening is Russian Eastern Overture, by Rimsky Korsakov.
